```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
documentation <- yaml::yaml.load_file("../metadata/documentation.yaml")

fluidRow(
  column(width = 12,
    h1("Documentation", class = "header-with-tab"),
    do.call(tabBox,
      c(width = 12,
        purrr::map(documentation,
          ~ tabPanel(.$title,
              includeRmd(paste0("../documentation/", .$id, ".Rmd")),
              value = .$id)
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
```
